attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When it was closed it may have been thought that it would not be needed for military personnel any longer.How wrong can you be! Increasing numbers of military personnel are being injured in Afghanistan, and will be for years to come, according to recent expert analyts, A nation that claims to be a major military power must have a dedicated military hospital and we will still need one for years after this conflict is over!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local NHS Primary Care Trust.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
